scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The first general folder in the Dallam family series comprises various items of correspondence including an 1818 letter from Henry Clay and another 1824 letter addressed to him, notes on the affairs of William S. Dallam written in Dr. Robert Peter's hand, an 1824 Logan County Circuit Court order regarding the execution of William S. Dallam's land, a list of his deeds in the Circuit Courthouse, and assorted guest lists.
